name: Lordly Trashcan
description: A peculiar entity born within the realm of fiction, its story documented in the nameless chronicles: A lone and valiant trashcan bearing the mission of the Garbage King to seek formidable warriors to eliminate all waste that threatens the world.

skills.name: The Can's Trials
skills.description: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: The Can's Tribulations
skills.description: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremovable.

skills.name: The Can's Creed
skills.description: When this unit is Weakness Broken, it will leave the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted, up to 2 Weaknesses.
